page.description: Commits the change made in the Editor to the value you are editing.

argument.name: UXEditorSet
argument.description: The name of the EditorSet you want to commit or a specific editor using the syntax 'editor:UXEditorName'

argument.name: flagCloseEditorSet
argument.description: Optional true/false value. Default value is *[js:true]*. Specify if the EditorSet should stay open, or be closed after the value is committed.

page.note: When an EditorSet is commited, the code defined in the '*[ui:Commit Editor Javascript]*' property for the active 'Editor' will be executed.
